artist: Producer: Hector Guimard; Publisher: Librairie Rouam et Cie., Paris; Author: Georges d'Hostingue; after photographs by Eugène Voisin
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
dimension: 12 3/8 x 17 in. (31.43 x 43.18 cm) (sheet, each, approximate)
medium: Portfolio of color lithographs after watercolor-tinted photographs, with title page, table of contents, construction credits, and introduction
portfolio: Le Castel Beranger oeuvre de Hector Guimard
provenance: Norwest Bank, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1998.
title: Le Castel Beranger oeuvre de Hector Guimard. L'Art dans l'Habitation Moderne.
